<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>true</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_707487_school_ma_teachers</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Notes BR</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
		if(current.operation()=='update'){
		var gr1 = current.GlideRecord('x_707487_school_ma_teachers');
		var gr2 = current.GlideRecord('x_707487_school_ma_students');
		gr1.addQuery('parent_linked',current.sys_id);
		gr1.query();

			gr1.notes= current.u_file_attachment_1; 
			gr1.notes_posted_on = current.posted_on;
			gr1.update();
		//}
		}
	
	
	

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-25 11:19:34</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c2f142c987550110159aa68d0ebb359d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Notes BR</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="School Management System" source="x_707487_school_ma">d926834187010110159aa68d0ebb3502</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="School Management System">d926834187010110159aa68d0ebb3502</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_c2f142c987550110159aa68d0ebb359d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-25 11:33:22</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c2f142c987550110159aa68d0ebb359d"/></record_update>
